title: Frontend Developer
description: Design and implement user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks. Collaborate with backend developers and designers to create seamless experiences.

title: React Developer
description: Build and maintain scalable React applications. Work closely with financial analysts to deliver efficient and interactive dashboards and tools.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Manage CI/CD pipelines, automate deployments, and monitor systems. Support marketing teams by ensuring uptime and performance of campaign platforms.

title: Project Manager
description: Lead cross-functional teams, manage project timelines, and deliver sales enablement tools on time. Ensure alignment with strategic sales goals.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design intuitive user experiences and appealing interfaces. Work with marketing and product teams to enhance customer engagement.

title: Backend Developer
description: Develop scalable backend APIs and services using .NET Core. Collaborate with frontend teams to integrate user-facing elements.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze complex datasets to generate actionable insights. Support business strategy by building reports and dashboards in Power BI.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Design and build advanced applications for Android and iOS. Work with product and design teams to define app features and UX.

title: QA Engineer
description: Create and execute test plans and cases. Work closely with developers to debug and resolve issues in web and mobile apps.

title: Digital Marketing Executive
description: Plan and execute digital campaigns across social media and search engines. Analyze performance metrics to optimize campaigns.
